meanings.definition: To come into sight or view.
meanings.sent1: The sun appears in the morning sky.
meanings.sent2: The cat appears at the window every evening.
meanings.sent3: It appears that the squirrel is hiding its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The stars appear like diamonds in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow appears after the rain, bringing colors to the sky.

meanings.definition: To seem or look a certain way.
meanings.sent1: She appears happy when she smiles.
meanings.sent2: The old house appears haunted at night.
meanings.sent3: It appears that the cake is delicious by the way she eats it.
meanings.sent4: The forest appears mysterious in the fog.
meanings.sent5: The mountain appears majestic against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: To be published or made available.
meanings.sent1: The new book appears in stores next week.
meanings.sent2: The movie appears on streaming platforms this Friday.
meanings.sent3: It appears that the latest issue of the magazine is sold out.
meanings.sent4: The news appears on the website as soon as it happens.
meanings.sent5: The concert tickets appear for sale online tomorrow.
